currentWork.description: Deployed to production - Branding, credentials, and browser automation all configured

completedPhases: Phase 1 - Foundation & Setup (pnpm workspaces, path aliases)
Phase 2 - Backend Integration (agent orchestrator, swarm services, memory, intelligence)
Phase 3 - Database Schema (18+ schema files, Claude Flow migration)
Phase 4 - Browser Automation (Browserbase + Stagehand fully integrated)
Phase 5 - Security & Auth (JWT, permissions, tenant isolation)
Phase 6 - tRPC API Routes (all routers implemented)
nextSteps: Run deployment verification: pnpm run deploy:check
Test agent orchestration: pnpm run dev:workers
Run E2E tests: pnpm run test:e2e:smoke
resumeInstructions: Bottleneck-Bots platform merge is COMPLETE. All Manus + Claude-Flow + GHL Agency AI components integrated. Run `pnpm run dev` to start development server.
